After 3 years as a programmer/ systems analyst on government and corporate projects, he moved to the UK to attend the London Film School. After graduating, he spent 10 years working as a motion picture executive for companies including Oscar-Winning producer Jeremy Thomasâ€™s Glinwood Films/ Films Trustees, and Mayfair Entertainment International. In 1996, together with investment banker Mark Beilby, Gavin founded independent media finance and production company Apollo Media, where he has produced and/ or financed over 20 movies.

Apollo Mobile was formed in 2006 via a merger with Sveng Interactive, a Finnish company that had developed a proprietary interactive content management system called RE4CTOR, a unique Java-based system that uses apps to deliver a similar user experience across virtually all mobile platforms.
